00034 /*
00035  * do not change this syncword, since not every 64 bit sequence is valid
00036  */
00037 const uint8_t TRX_SYNC_WORD[] =     /**< Default sync word for transceiver. */
00038     CONFIG_DEFAULT_SYNCWORD;

00040 /**************************************************************************/
00041 void NTRXSetDefaultMode( void )
00042 /**************************************************************************/
00043 {
00044 
00045 #   ifdef CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_22MHZ_1000NS
00046     modeSet.bw = NA_22MHz;
00047     modeSet.sd = NA_1us;
00048     modeSet.sr = NA_1M_S;
00049     modeSet.fdma= TRUE;
00050     modeSet.fec = FALSE;
00051     modeSet.fixnmap=NA_FIX_MODE;
00052     modeSet.rangingConst_FECon=0.0; /* no ranging allowed */
00053     modeSet.rangingTimeout=0; /* no ranging allowed */
00054     modeSet.rangingFastTimeout=0;   /* no ranging allowed */
00055 #   endif /* CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_22MHZ_1000NS */
00056 
00057 #   ifdef CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_22MHZ_2000NS
00058     modeSet.bw = NA_22MHz;
00059     modeSet.sd = NA_2us;
00060     modeSet.sr = NA_500k_S;
00061     modeSet.fdma= TRUE;
00062     modeSet.fec = FALSE;
00063     modeSet.fixnmap=NA_FIX_MODE;
00064     modeSet.rangingConst_FECon=0.0; /* no ranging allowed */
00065     modeSet.rangingTimeout=0; /* no ranging allowed */
00066     modeSet.rangingFastTimeout=0;   /* no ranging allowed */
00067 #   endif /* CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_22MHZ_2000NS */
00068 
00069 #   ifdef CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_22MHZ_4000NS
00070     modeSet.bw = NA_22MHz;
00071     modeSet.sd = NA_4us;
00072     modeSet.sr = NA_250k_S;

00074     modeSet.fec = FALSE;
00075     modeSet.fixnmap=NA_FIX_MODE;
00076     modeSet.rangingConst_FECon=0.0; /* no ranging allowed */
00077     modeSet.rangingTimeout=0; /* no ranging allowed */
00078     modeSet.rangingFastTimeout=0;   /* no ranging allowed */
00079 #   endif /* CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_22MHZ_4000NS */
00080 
00081 #   ifdef CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_500NS
00082     modeSet.bw = NA_80MHz;
00083     modeSet.sd = NA_500ns;
00084     modeSet.sr = NA_2M_S;
00085     modeSet.fdma= FALSE;
00086     modeSet.fec = FALSE;
00087     modeSet.fixnmap=NA_FIX_MODE;
00088     modeSet.rangingConst_FECon=68.929336; /**/
00089     modeSet.rangingConst_FECoff=53.991800; /**/
00090     modeSet.rangingTimeout      =   RANGING_TIMEOUT_6MS;
00091     modeSet.rangingFastTimeout  =   RANGING_TIMEOUT_4MS;
00092 #   endif /* CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_500NS */
00093 
00094 #   ifdef CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_1000NS
00095     modeSet.bw = NA_80MHz;
00096     modeSet.sd = NA_1us;
00097     modeSet.sr = NA_1M_S;

00099     modeSet.fec = FALSE;
00100     modeSet.fixnmap=NA_FIX_MODE;
00101     modeSet.rangingConst_FECon=122.55664361;
00102     modeSet.rangingConst_FECoff=92.494781680; /* after gate size9 measurements */
00103     modeSet.rangingTimeout      =   RANGING_TIMEOUT_7MS;

00105 #   endif /* CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_1000NS */
00106

00119

00128     modeSet.rangingConst_FECoff=325.587060636; /* [s] */
00129

00132 #   endif /* CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_4000NS */
00133 
00134 
00135     phyPIB.pwrUp = TRUE;
00136 }
00137 
00138 /**
00139  * @brief Initializing of the transceiver chip.
00140  *
00141  * This function initializes all registers of the nanoLOC transceiver chip.
00142  * This function should only be called once.
00143  *
00144  * If this function is called for the first time, the structure settingVal is
00145  * set to the predefined default mode values. After setting up the SPI interface
00146  * this function compares the version and revision register of the chip with
00147  * the values expected by the driver. If these don't match, the software will
00148  * call an error function and halts. The reason for this drastic reaction
00149  * is that the driver can not garantie a non interfering behaviour.
00150  *
00151  */
00152 /**************************************************************************/
00153 bool_t NTRXInit(void)
00154 /**************************************************************************/
00155 {
00156     /* init SPI HW&SW */
00157     InitSPI();
00158     NTRXPowerOnReset();
00159 
00160     /* initialize shadow registers */
00161     NTRXInitShadowRegister ();
00162     /* configure SPI output of chip MSB first / push pull */
00163     NTRXSetupSpiInterface ();
00164 
00165     HWDelayus( 1 ); //!! Some short delay seems necessary here??
00166     /* check connection and firmware version and revision */
00167     if (!NTRXCheckVerRev())
00168     {
00169         return( FALSE );
00170     }
00171 
00172 #if 0
00173     PRINTF("TRX_SYNC_WORD : 0x%02X 0x%02X 0x%02X 0x%02X 0x%02X 0x%02X 0x%02X 0x%02X\n",
00174     (int)TRX_SYNC_WORD[0],
00175     (int)TRX_SYNC_WORD[1],
00176     (int)TRX_SYNC_WORD[2],
00177     (int)TRX_SYNC_WORD[3],
00178     (int)TRX_SYNC_WORD[4],
00179     (int)TRX_SYNC_WORD[5],
00180     (int)TRX_SYNC_WORD[6],
00181     (int)TRX_SYNC_WORD[7]);
00182 #endif
00183 
00184     memcpy (phyPIB.syncword, TRX_SYNC_WORD, 8 );
00185     if (modeSet.bw != NA_22MHz)
00186     {
00187         NTRXSetChannel( 0 );
00188     }
00189     else
00190     {
00191         NTRXSetChannel( 2 );
00192     }
00193     NTRXSetupTrxMode (modeSet.bw, modeSet.sd, modeSet.sr);
00194     phyPIB.pwrDown = FALSE;
00195     return( TRUE );
00196 }
